name: 2024 7th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Pattern Recognition
content: Publication: After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1717-8), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). --AIPR 2018-2022 Proceedings have been included in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus. Some selected papers, after content extension (at least 40%) and peer-review, will be recommended to be published in Information Sciences as regular papers. -ISSN: 0020-0255 -Impact Factor: 6.795 -Abstracting and Indexing: Science Citation Index, Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. -https://www.journals.elsevier.com/information-sciences
